II1  e1,
II2  b2,
II2  e2,
OI  x 
)

Parameters:
b an iterator to the beginning of an input sequence (inclusive)
e an iterator to the end of an input sequence (exclusive)

e2 an iterator to the end of an input sequence (exclusive)
x an iterator to the beginning of an output sequence (inclusive)
Returns:
an iterator to the end of an output sequence (exclusive) the sequences are of decimal digits output the division of the two input sequences into the output sequence (s1 / s2) => x
